name: Naginata of Thunder
text:
Equip only to a Warrior-Type or Beast-Warrior-Type Monster. The equipped monster is also treated as Thunder-Type in addition to its original Type and gains 700 ATK/DEF. Once per turn, you can pay 1000 LP; destroy 1 Spell/Trap card your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Naginata of Thunder" once per turn. Only 1 "Naginata of Thunder" can be equipped to a monster at a time.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
